page.title: 07A TYPICAL DAY, BY MARK
page.content: I awoke yesterday morning at 8 a.m. Ibrushed my teeth,washed my face and hands.I got dressed and had coffee and a buttery for my breakfast,with my mum who is called Irene,my dad Colin,and my sister who is called Jenny.I set off for school about 8.40.I arrived at 8.50.We had some maths and language,art and gym.We also did some work on the domesday project. When I arrived home I had a game of football by myself.I was practising free kicks.I came in about 5.20 and watched connections on the t.v. for 20 minutes.It was a quiz game.I then had my tea which was steak and chips. I played with my toy tractors,and then played more football.I practised heading the ball by myself,and then went to my bed about 10.10p.m.It had been a pretty average sort of day.
